name: Add product to cart
description:
As a user
  I want to add products to my shopping cart
  So that I can purchase them later

children.name: Add a single product to cart
Given I open the application
And I login with valid credentials "vcvikas@gmail.com" and "Newpass@13"

description:
As a user
  I want to pay for my order
  So that I can successfully complete my purchase

children.name: Enter payment details and confirm order
Given I open the application
And I login with valid credentials "vcvikas@gmail.com" and "Newpass@13"

children.name: When I navigate to Products page
And I add the product with description "Blue Top" to the cart
Then I should see a success message "Your product has been added to cart."
And I click on continue shopping button
And I click on Cart link
And I should see the product added with description "Blue Top" added
Given I click on Proceed to checkout button
When I enter payment details with card name "Vikas", card number "4111111111111111", cvc "123", expiry "12", year "2026"
And I click on Pay and Confirm Order
Then I should see a payment success message "Congratulations! Your order has been confirmed!"
applicationHooks.Hooks.takeScreenshot(io.cucumber.java.Scenario)

children.name: Login with incorrect credentials
Given user is on login page
When user enters email "vcvikas@gmail.com"
And user enters password "Sign@13"
And user clicks on Login button
Then page contains "Your email or password is incorrect!" message
Login with correct credentials
Given user is on login page
When user enters email "vcvikas@gmail.com"
And user enters password "Newpass@13"
And user clicks on Login button
Then page contains "Logged in as Vikas" message

name: Cart Page functionality
description:
As a user
  I want to view my shopping cart
  So that I can update or remove products before checkout

children.name: View cart contents
Given I open the application
And I login with valid credentials "vcvikas@gmail.com" and "Newpass@13"
When I navigate to Products page
And I add the product with description "Blue Top" to the cart
Then I should see a success message "Your product has been added to cart."
And I click on continue shopping button
When I click on Cart link
Then I should see the product added with description "Blue Top" added

name: Home Page functionality
description:
As a user
  I want to view and interact with the home page
  So that I can navigate to products and cart sections

children.name: Verify home page loads successfully
Given I open the application
Then I should see the logo displayed
And I should see the "Home" menu highlighted
And I should see Products, Cart links
